title: League won't open on mac
body: Open and the icon just bounces then nothing.. application not responding. Tried opening from all locations. Reinstalled which fix the problem for one login. Next time i relogged, back to the same issue.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm that's interesting. Are you seeing any kind of errors pop up or just....nothing?

If you never see any kind of error, there's a chance this is being caused by something blocking the patcher from connecting to our servers. Let's see if we can narrow down this issue by going through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac). Particularly the section on administrator settings.

 Let me know if you've got any questions.
